long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e:
Leads Finder for Bing Maps is a powerful business lead generation tool that helps you easily find the contact information of prospective customers from Bing Maps. With just one click, you can instantly access a wealth of high-value business leads. 

We can find target customer data from anywhere across the globe on Bing Maps, including Name, Address, Phone, Website, Geographic Coordinates, Rating, Categories, Business Hours, and more. The extracted data is automatically compiled into an Excel sheet for further analysis and use. Support export in CSV, JSON, and XLSX (Excel) formats.

This is the most efficient lead-scraping tool in the industry. It can analyze and gather data from Bing Maps results in seconds. This ultra-fast finding speed provides great support for your business expansion and market development.  

We can provide you with a huge amount of high-quality business leads, which is tremendously beneficial for B2B sales, marketing campaigns as well as business planning. It's a powerful tool to fuel your business growth.

Leads Finder for Bing Maps is an easy-to-use yet powerful business lead generation tool. If you need to quickly and efficiently obtain business leads for sales prospecting and marketing, it will be your best pick.

Data Privacy
Your data stays on your device and is not stored or transmitted to our servers. We prioritize keeping your information secure and confidential.

Disclaimer
This extension is an independently developed product by ExtensionsBox and has no association with Bing.com.

We can find target customer data from anywhere across the globe on Bing Maps, including Name, Address, Phone, Website, Geographic Coordinates, Rating, Categories, Business Hours, and more. The extracted data is automatically compiled into an Excel sheet for further analysis and use. Support export in CSV, JSON, and XLSX (Excel) formats.

This is the most efficient lead-scraping tool in the industry. It can analyze and gather data from Bing Maps results in seconds. This ultra-fast finding speed provides great support for your business expansion and market development.
